name: Kong Ingress Controller
description: Kubernetes-native API gateway that extends Kong Gateway to manage ingress traffic, API routing, and traffic policies for microservices.
author: Kong

name: Apache APISIX
description: Cloud-native API gateway delivering high performance, observability, and extensible plugin ecosystem for microservices and APIs.
author: Apache Software Foundation

name: Traefik
description: Modern cloud-native reverse proxy and ingress controller with automatic service discovery, Let's Encrypt integration, and dynamic configuration.
author: Traefik Labs

name: Envoy Gateway
description: Kubernetes Gateway API implementation powered by Envoy Proxy, providing expressive and extensible traffic routing and management.
author: Envoy Proxy

name: Kgateway
description: Kubernetes-native API gateway built on Envoy Proxy, supporting the Gateway API with advanced traffic management and transformation capabilities.
author: Kgateway

name: WSO2 API Platform
description: Cloud-native API management platform for Kubernetes providing full lifecycle API management, rate limiting, and developer portal capabilities.
author: WSO2

name: Argo Workflows
description: Kubernetes-native workflow engine for orchestrating parallel jobs, CI/CD pipelines, and complex DAG-based workflows.
author: Argo Project

name: Tekton Pipelines
description: Cloud-native CI/CD framework providing Kubernetes-native building blocks for creating and running continuous integration and delivery pipelines.
author: Tekton

name: OpenSearch
description: Community-driven search and analytics suite for log analytics, observability, and security monitoring with powerful visualization dashboards.
author: OpenSearch Project

name: OpenObserve
description: High-performance observability platform for logs, metrics, and traces with built-in dashboards, alerting, and significantly lower storage costs.
author: OpenObserve

name: Flux CD
description: Continuous delivery solution for Kubernetes that keeps clusters in sync with sources of configuration using a declarative, GitOps approach.
author: Flux Project

name: Argo CD
description: Declarative GitOps continuous delivery tool for Kubernetes that automates application deployment and lifecycle management from Git repositories.
author: Argo Project

name: GitHub Actions
description: Automate software workflows with CI/CD pipelines directly in GitHub, supporting build, test, and deployment with a rich ecosystem of reusable actions.
author: GitHub

name: Jenkins
description: Extensible open source automation server for building, testing, and deploying software with hundreds of plugins for CI/CD pipelines.
author: Jenkins
